issue.title: Adding pushdown projection or filtering for ToProto Scan
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16909](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16909). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We aren't handling any kind of pushdown projection or filtering in https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16855.

It would be better to finalize this once 

Both of those would probably be a bit easier to do if I ever got around to finishing https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16072.
